Asssuming that oil and gas boilers of comparable capacity have approximately the same material and energy uses for manufactring, the module for oil industrial furnace 1 MW has been directly used. Thus, through the description of the infrastructure of the oil boiler, the module includes the most important materials used for production. It includes also the transport of these materials and the energy and water needed for production.
